articles.content:

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: El Salvador approves law to make bitcoin legal tender - CNA
articles.description: The Congress of El Salvador has approved a law that will classify Bitcoin as legal tender in the Central American country, its president said, making it the world's first nation to adopt a cryptocurrency.
